title: Whenever a Janna flashes "Rank 7 Mastery" icon after landing a clutch E shield....
body: I just break into laughter.  Seriously, last ARAM Janna just pressed E on Corki and won.  Yet she flash, flash, flashed that Rank 7 emote.  Seriously, I did more cool stuff as Janna the other night and I'm only Rank 5.  When will people learn she doesn't take skill and that Rank 7 just depends on if you can suffer through the boredom that is playing her that long.
